name: Healthyfied Pork and Mushrooms
description: This Healthyfied Pork and Mushrooms recipe is a delicious way to enjoy a high-protein meal without sacrificing flavor. Perfect for those looking for healthy alternatives.
recipeIngredient: 1  pat (1 inch sq, 1/2 inch high), Butter, unsalted

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Bokchoi under cold water and chop it into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and finely chop the White onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and mince the garlic cloves.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Clean the White Button mushrooms by wiping them with a damp cloth and slice them.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the Pork Tenderloin into thin strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Seed and dice the Red bell pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, sautéing until soft and fragrant, about 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Increase the heat to medium-high and add the pork strips to the pan. Cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced mushrooms and diced red bell pepper to the pan, cooking until they start to soften, about 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the Worcestershire sauce, salt, and ground black pepper, cooking for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 10

recipeInstructions.text: Lower the heat to medium and pour in the Puremilk. Let the mixture simmer until the sauce slightly thickens, about 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 11

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped Bokchoi to the pan, cover, and let it steam until tender, about 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 12
